name: Mezzatorre Hotel & Thermal Spa
heroDescription: Perched above a private bay on Ischia, Mezzatorre Hotel & Thermal Spa occupies a historic 16th century watchtower. An exceptional hideaway overlooking the Gulf of Naples.
intro: Perched above a private bay on Ischia, Mezzatorre Hotel & Thermal Spa occupies a historic 16th century watchtower. Today, it blends heritage, nature, and wellness — an exceptional hideaway proudly overlooking the Gulf of Naples, offering an intimate escape with thermal spa facilities and stunning Mediterranean views.

history.description: The structure that houses Mezzatorre Hotel & Thermal Spa has a fascinating history. It was, in fact, an ancient watchtower built between the 16th and 17th century by the Aragonese, which however was never finished (fittingly the name 'Mezzatorre' translates as 'Half-Tower'). It was enlarged in the 18th century by the dukes of Rancidello.
history.modernEra: In the 1930s, the tower was used as a pension until Luigi Patalano, a distinguished scholar, politician and poet, bought it. Founder of political and cultural magazines, he transformed the property into an active cultural cenacle. In the same park as Mezzatorre Patalano also built 'La Colombaia', a beautiful villa that was first owned by Baron Fassini, an aristocrat and bon viveur, and then, in the 50s, by film director Luchino Visconti. In 2018, the Sciò family came across Mezzatorre, fell in love with it and in 2019, the Pellicano Hotels Group took over its management. Marie-Louise Sciò, CEO & Creative Director of the Group, injected her very own personality into every corner of the property — and transformed it into an exceptional Italian abode that fits right into the Pellicano world.

exclusiveUseDetails.description: Exclusive use includes complete privacy of the entire estate, allowing your event to unfold across all 48 rooms and extensive common areas. Every guest enjoys VIP treatment with gourmet breakfast, complementary minibar access, and full access to all facilities including the thermal spa, private bay, beach club, heated pool, tennis court, and gym. Private motorboat transfers to the bay are available upon request.
exclusiveUseDetails.transfers: Private transfers by motorboat to our private bay are available upon request (sea conditions permitting). The service also includes a transfer by car from Naples's airport to the port of Pozzuoli. The speedboat ride takes approximately 35 minutes.

faqs.a: Yes, all 48 rooms and common areas are included for exclusive events, providing complete privacy for your celebration.
Gourmet breakfast, minibar, thermal spa access, wellness centre, outdoor pool, private bay and beach club, tennis court, gym, VIP treatment, Wi-Fi, and parking.

faqs.q: How do guests reach the hotel?
faqs.a: Guests can reach Ischia via hydrofoil (1h30), ferry (2h20), or private motorboat (1h) from Naples. We can arrange transfers from Naples airport to Pozzuoli port, followed by speedboat to the private bay (35 minutes).

faqs.q: What wellness and group activities are available?
faqs.a: We offer thermal spa treatments, yoga and pilates classes, wellness therapies, wine tastings, cooking classes, sea and mountain excursions, and boat trips around the island.
Yes, we can arrange private motorboat transfers directly to our private bay, as well as helicopter transfers to Casamicciola Heliport (2.5km away).
